info.title: Catalog API
info.description:
Methods for collecting product/sku catalog data, categories, brands and other information.

All content that comes between {{}} keys must be replaced with the correct data before performing the request.

Common parameters that must be changed in most VTEX requests
{{accountName}} => Store account name
{{environment}} => The environment that will be called. Change for vtexcommercestable or vtexcommmercebeta
{{X-VTEX-API-AppKey}} => Located in the headers of the requests, user authentication key
{{X-VTEX-API-AppToken}} => Located in the headers of the requests, authentication password

get.description: Retrieves a specific Category by its ID

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

get.description: Retrieves the Category Tree from your store. Get all the category level registered in Catalog or define up to what level you want to get.

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

get.description: Retrieves a specific Brand by its ID
Retrieves all Brands registered in Catalog Store
Retrieves all specifications of a specific Product by its ID

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

post.description: Update value of a Product specification by Product ID. The ID or Name can be used to identify what Product Specification will be updated. Specification fields must be previously created in your catalog.

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

get.description: Get all specifications from a Category by its ID

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: List all specifications including the current category and the level zero specifications from a Category by its ID

text/plain.example: policyref="/w3c/p3p.xml",CP="ADMa OUR NOR CNT NID DSP NOI COR"

post.description: Amplify your Cart data by associate attachments to SKUs. This request remove existing sku attachments associations and recreates the associations with those being posted.
